description.english: You defeated the Trolls.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu les trolls.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto i troll.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a los trols.

description.english: You completed the prologue.
description.french: Vous avez terminé le prologue.
description.italian: Hai completato il prologo.
description.spanish: Has completado el prólogo.

description.english: Complete the prologue tutorial quest.
description.french: Terminer la quête de didacticiel du prologue.
description.italian: Completa la missione tutorial del prologo
description.spanish: Completa la misión tutorial del prólogo.

description.english: You completed Act 1.
description.french: Vous avez terminé l'acte 1.
description.italian: Hai completato l'Atto 1.
description.spanish: Has completado el acto 1.

description.english: You completed Act 2.
description.french: Vous avez terminé l'acte 2.
description.italian: Hai completato l'Atto 2.
description.spanish: Has completado el acto 2.

description.english: You completed Act 3.
description.french: Vous avez terminé l'acte 3.
description.italian: Hai completato l'Atto 3.
description.spanish: Has completado el acto 3.

description.english: You helped Ricket fix her forge.
description.french: Vous avez aidé Ricket à réparer sa forge.
description.italian: Hai aiutato Ricket a riparare la fucina.
description.spanish: Has ayudado a Ricket a arreglar su forja.

description.english: You crashed the banquet.
description.french: Vous avez ruiné le banquet.
description.italian: Hai rovinato il banchetto.
description.spanish: Has irrumpido en el banquete.

description.english: You introduced the peasants to the zombies!
description.german: Du hast den Bauern die Zombies vorgestellt!
description.french: Vous avez présenté les paysans aux zombies !
description.italian: Hai presentato i contadini agli zombi!
description.spanish: ¡Les has presentado los campesinos a los zombis!

displayName.french: Le mal a trouvé la voie
displayName.italian: Il male trova sempre la strada
displayName.spanish: El mal ha encontrado un camino

description.english: The plot thickens.
description.french: Le mystère s'épaissit.
description.italian: Il mistero s'infittisce.
description.spanish: La trama se complica.

description.english: Gain 100 crowns in-game through winning phases	.
description.german: Erlange 100 Kronen, indem du Phasen gewinnst.
description.french: Obtenir 100 couronnes en jeu en remportant des phases.
description.italian: Ottieni 100 corone in gioco superando le fasi.
description.spanish: Obtén 100 coronas en el juego ganando fases.

description.english: Have 12 of your minions active at a given moment.
description.german: Rufe 12 deiner Schergen zur gleichen Zeit herbei.
description.french: Avoir 12 Larbins ou plus actifs à un même moment.
description.italian: Attiva 12 dei tuoi Serventi allo stesso tempo.
description.spanish: Ten a 12 de tus esbirros activos en un momento dado.

description.english: Kill 50 sheep.
description.french: Tuer 50 moutons.
description.italian: Uccidi 50 pecore
description.spanish: Mata a 50 ovejas.

description.english: Gain 100% of the crowns in one quest.
description.german: Gewinne bei einer Quest 100 % der Kronen
description.french: Obtenir 100 % des couronnes d'une seule quête.
description.italian: Ottieni il 100% delle corone in 1 missione
description.spanish: Gana el 100% de las coronas en una misión.

description.english: Obtain all weapons for all characters.
description.german: Erwerbe alle Waffen für alle Charaktere
description.french: Obtenir toutes les armes de tous les personnages.
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le armi per ogni personaggio
description.spanish: Consigue todas las armas para todos los personajes.

description.english: With four players, each summon at least 4 minions at the same time.
description.german: Alle 4 Spieler müssen gleichzeitig mindestens 4 Schergen herbeirufen.
description.french: Avec quatre joueurs, chacun doit invoquer 4 Larbins au même moment.
description.italian: Ciascuno dei 4 giocatori invochi 4 Serventi allo stesso tempo.
description.spanish: Con cuatro jugadores, invocad a 4 esbirros cada uno al mismo tiempo.

description.english: Receive the healing effect of blue minions 500 times.
description.german: Lass dich 500 Mal von blauen Schergen heilen.
description.french: Recevoir l'effet de guérison des Larbins bleus 500 fois.
description.italian: Fatti curare dai Serventi blu 500 volte.
description.spanish: Recibe el efecto curativo de los esbirros azules 500 veces.

displayName.spanish: Asesino a sueldo de gran discreción

description.english: Summon Green minions to assassinate 50 enemies
description.german: Rufe grüne Schergen herbei, um 50 Feinde zu töten
description.french: Invoquer des Larbins verts pour assassiner 50 ennemis.
description.italian: Invoca i Serventi verdi per uccidere 50 nemici
description.spanish: Invoca a esbirros verdes para asesinar a 50 enemigos

description.english: Kill 100 enemies with explosive red minions.
description.german: Töte 100 Feinde mit explosiven roten Schergen.
description.french: Tuer 100 ennemis avec des Larbins rouges explosifs.
description.italian: Uccidi 100 nemici con i Serventi rossi esplosivi
description.spanish: Mata a 100 enemigos con esbirros rojos explosivos.

description.english: Kill 50 enemies with defensive brown minions.
description.french: Tuer 50 ennemis avec des Larbins bruns défensifs.
description.italian: Uccidi 50 nemici con i Serventi marroni difensivi.
description.spanish: Mata a 50 enemigos con esbirros marrones defensivos.

description.english: Summon minions 50 times.
description.french: Invoquer des Larbins 50 fois.
description.italian: Invoca i Serventi 50 volte
description.spanish: Invoca esbirros 50 veces.

description.english: Summon minions 250 times	.
description.french: Invoquer des Larbins 250 fois.
description.italian: Invoca i Serventi 250 volte
description.spanish: Invoca esbirros 250 veces.

description.english: Summon minions 500 times	.
description.french: Invoquer des Larbins 500 fois.
description.italian: Invoca i Serventi 500 volte
description.spanish: Invoca esbirros 500 veces.

description.english: Receive loot from minions 250 times.
description.french: Recevoir du butin de vos Larbins 250 fois.
description.italian: Ricevi bottino dai Serventi 250 volte
description.spanish: Recibe botín de esbirros 250 veces.

description.english: Complete/win 100 traversal states within the time limit.
description.french: Terminer/remporter 100 tâches de traversée dans le temps imparti.
description.italian: Completa/vinci 100 obiettivi secondari nel tempo limite
description.spanish: Completa/gana 100 estados secundarios dentro del límite de tiempo.

description.english: Buy all of the upgrades for one minion colour.
description.german: Kauf alle Aufwertungen für eine Schergenfarbe.
description.french: Acheter toutes les améliorations d'une couleur de Larbin.
description.italian: Acquista tutte le migliorie per i Serventi di un colore
description.spanish: Compra todas las mejoras para un color de esbirro.

description.english: Buy all of the upgrades for all minion colours.
description.german: Kauf alle Aufwertungen für alle Schergenfarben.
description.french: Acheter toutes les améliorations de toutes les couleurs de Larbins.
description.italian: Acquista tutte le migliorie per ogni colore di Serventi.
description.spanish: Compra todas las mejoras para los cuatro colores de esbirro.

description.english: Buy half of one character's statue upgrades.
description.german: Kauf die Hälfte der Statue-Aufwertungen eines Charakters.
description.french: Acheter la moitié des améliorations de statue d'un personnage.
description.italian: Acquista la metà delle migliorie della statua di un personaggio.
description.spanish: Compra la mitad de las mejoras de la estatua de un personaje.

description.english: Buy all of one character's statue upgrades.
description.french: Acheter toutes les améliorations de statue d'un personnage.
description.italian: Acquista ogni miglioria della statua di un personaggio.
description.spanish: Compra todas las mejoras de la estatua de un personaje.

description.english: Buy all statue upgrades for all four characters.
description.german: Kauf alle Statue-Aufwertungen für alle Charaktere.
description.french: Acheter les améliorations de statue de tous les personnages.
description.italian: Acquista ogni miglioria di tutte le statue dei 4 personaggi.
description.spanish: Compra todas las mejoras de la estatua de los cuatro personajes.

description.english: Knock 20 enemies off the side of the world and into the abyss!
description.german: Stoß  20 Feinde in den Höllenschlund hinab!
description.french: Repousser 20 ennemis hors du monde dans les abysses.
description.italian: Catapulta 20 nemici dalla faccia della terra nell'Abisso!
description.spanish: ¡Derriba a 20 enemigos del mundo y lánzalos al abismo!

description.english: "Careful, we already lost one Overlord down there! I wonder what happened to him?" - Gnarl
description.german: Vorsicht, wir haben da unten schon einen Overlord verloren! Was ihm wohl passiert ist? – Gnarl
description.french: Attention, on a déjà perdu un Overlord ici ! Je me demande ce qui lui est arrivé... - Biscornu
description.italian: Attento, laggiù abbiamo già perso un Overlord! Ancora mi chiedo che ne sia stato? - Gnarl
description.spanish: Cuidado, ¡ya perdimos a un Overlord ahí abajo! ¿Qué sería de él? Krazak

displayName.english: Get by with a little help from your enemies
displayName.german: Ein Freund, ein guter Freund (oder mehrere)
displayName.italian: Cavatela anche con una mano dagli avversari
displayName.spanish: Solo no puedes, con amigos sí

description.english: Complete any quest in online multiplayer, with at least one other player.
description.german: Schließe irgendeine Quest im Online-Mehrspielerspiel ab, mit wenigstens einem anderen Spieler.
description.french: Terminer une quête en multijoueur en ligne avec au moins un autre joueur.
description.italian: Completa una missione qualsiasi nel multigiocatore online, con almeno un altro giocatore.
description.spanish: Completa cualquier misión multijugador en línea con al menos un jugador más.

description.english: Kill a "boss enemy" in a multiplayer game.
description.french: Tuer un « boss ennemi » dans une partie multijoueur.
description.italian: Uccidi un "boss nemico" in una partita multigiocatore.
description.spanish: Mata a un "enemigo jefe" en una partida multijugador.

description.english: Complete a quest in local co-op with at least 2 players present.
description.german: Schließe eine Quest im lokalen Koop mit mindestens 2 Spielern ab.
description.french: Terminer une quête en coopération locale avec au moins 2 joueurs présents.
description.italian: Completa una missione in co-op locale con almeno altri 2 giocatori presenti.
description.spanish: Completa una misión en modo local cooperativo con al menos 2 jugadores presentes.

description.english: Finish a quest in first place in multiplayer.
description.german: Schließ im Mehrspieler eine Quest als 1. ab.
description.french: Terminer une quête à la 1re place en multijoueur.
description.italian: Completa una missione multigiocatore piazzandoti al 1° posto
description.spanish: Termina una misión antes que nadie en el modo multijugador.

description.english: You defeated Cedric
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Cédric.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Cedric.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Cedric.

description.english: You defeated Clarissa
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Clarissa.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Clarissa.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Clarisa.

description.english: You defeated the Void Gazer
description.french: Vous avez vaincu l'Œil vitreux
description.italian: Hai sconfitto l'Osservatore incapace.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al contemplador del vacío.

description.english: You defeated Sparkle.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Sparkle.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Sparkle.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Chispas.
